name: TimberCrate: Stack attack renovation for retro-nostalgics
name_original: TimberCrate: Stack attack renovation for retro-nostalgics
description:
Timbercrate is a renovation of the legendary Stack Attack. In Timbercrate, you play for a tricky sorter Tim. Tim must sort falling boxes, preventing them from accumulating. 

Over time, the boxes appear faster and faster, and the speed of their fall increases. Tim sorts them into rows of 12 pieces, clears the playing field and thereby earns points. 
 
The magic helmet prevents the box from falling on the Tim's head. The helmet destroys the box and gives you bonus points, however, there is a skill reset time that you can reduce by buying the corresponding upgrades at the game store. 
 
By earning points, Tim also earns the game currency-timbercrates. You can improve the speed of your character, as well as reduce the reset time of his skill for it. 
Improve Tim's abilities, earn as many points as possible, compete with other players with your achievements and become the best sorter. 

Features: 
◆ renovation of the classic Stack Attack game. 
◆ Skill game is aimed at any age. 
◆ Nice graphics. 
◆ The download is free but you can purchase game objects for real money. 
◆ The game contains advertising, which you can disable by purchasing a special item at the game store.
